name: TASK_LINKED_EXT_ENC
description: Holds the reference ID for the external event that triggered task creation in the Task Engine.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_ENC_REFERENCE
columns.description: This item stores the base DXR reference ID of each external encounter currently linked to the task.

columns.name: EXT_ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.description: This item stores the DXO ID of each external encounter currently linked to the task.

columns.name: EXT_ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
